channel.title: Would like your opinion please on my first site
channel.description:
[center]Hey Everyone would like your opinion on this site im currently working on, this is the first site i have made and would like if people would tell me what needs changing or adding etc etc..
No coding is done for the website yet but when i have done so i will upload the source code here so you cann tell me where to improve there too.
[img]http://i394.photobucket.com/albums/pp24/gpaccount/Sample_zpsc5eeef33.jpg[/img][/center]

@dave3 wrote:

item.title: Would like your opinion please on my first site
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

When I look at the page, I get confused as to what I’m actually supposed to be looking at. Your panes for ‘Play Now,’ ‘Download,’ and ‘News’ are all the same size. My eyes don’t really know where to go or what to focus on. What’s more important? Sharing news? Playing the game? Downloading it? Now pick one, and have the other two as equal, but lesser importance. Design your layouts around importance and emphasis.

I would question what’s going in the img scrollbox area. Assuming it’s some sort of news scroller, I would recommend you either have a main news pain or the scroller, not both. If it’s anything else, it’s running into that size issue like the other panes. Consider making it smaller.

That’s all I have for now, other than what’s been said.

Read full topic
item.source: Would like your opinion please on my first site

item.title: Would like your opinion please on my first site
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Not bad for a first try. I can’t properly provide feedback without the source-code but you should focus on your images, they’re pixelated on the edges, this looks very unprofessional. You should also add the use of a new font to the page, it needs it.

Read full topic
item.source: Would like your opinion please on my first site

item.title: Would like your opinion please on my first site
item.dc:creator: @Sibor Sibor
item.description:
@Sibor wrote:

Very nice for your first time. Maybe edit the links and do a:link {text-decoration: none;} a:hover{text-decoration: underline;}. Maybe make the picture same width as the three boxes, and pick a few colors to change, lol. Black, gold, white and blue don’t go too well.

Read full topic
item.source: Would like your opinion please on my first site
